QPlainText

0.1.0

QPlaintext is a plain text editor library which depends only on Qt. It is meant to allow a consistent API for plugins across editors that use the library while allowing editors to customize the library's appearence and functionality as they see fit.

Generated on Tue Apr 26 2011 15:05:06 for QPlainText by  1.7.1
